docs.lead_paragraph: The following are excerpts from a paper presented to last week's convention of the American Association for the Advancement of Science by Roger Revelle of Harvard University's Center for Population Studies.

headline.main: Another Opinion; The Failures of Western Science Irrelevant Inventions Utilizing the Atom

docs.abstract: Excerpts from Prof R Revelle rept to AAAS on problems created throughout world by tech advances
docs.snippet: The following are excerpts from a paper presented to last week's convention of the American Association for the Advancement of Science by Roger Revelle of Harvard University's Center for Population Studies.

docs.lead_paragraph: Three drug companies were found guilty last night of conspiring to control the production and distribution of $1.7billion worth of antibiotics.

headline.main: 3 Drug Companies Guilty of Monopoly In Antibiotic Field; 3 Drug Companies Found Guilty Of Monopoly in Antibiotic Field

docs.abstract: Amer Cyanamid, Bristol-Myers and C Pfizer & Co found guilty, Fed Ct, NYC, of conspiring to control production and distribution of $1.7-billion worth of antibiotics; enormous profits on Tetracycline charged by Govt; 2 cos plan appeal
docs.snippet: Three drug companies were found guilty last night of conspiring to control the production and distribution of $1.7billion worth of antibiotics.
